ref_criterion: Recommends consulting with a dermatologist to evaluate the skin and rule out any underlying condition that may be causing dryness.
gen_criterion: Incorrectly states that a certain skincare product is suitable for all skin types when it is actually only suitable for dry skin.

ref_criterion: Attempts to gather clinical context by inquiring about affected areas, duration of symptoms, history of skin or systemic diseases, and previous treatments.
